extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime
[B]1.79[/B] - github actions testing. No updates but a false version bump.
[B]1.78[/B] - Update cloudflare detection thanks to lolage331
[B]1.77[/B] - Update useragent and pattern path
[B]1.76[/B] - Update to resolve potential index out range on some devices using Kodi
[B]1.75[/B] - Updated User Agent and Thumbnail fixes thanks to 0.6.7 update from https://r.nf/r/Addons4Kodi/comments/sqxj50/release_watchnixtoons2_060/
[B]1.74[/B] - Change free domain from wcofun.com wcofun.net
[B]1.73[/B] - Update to fix potential index out of range issue
[B]1.72[/B] - Update to fix Cloudflare TLS issue thanks to 0.6.3 update from https://r.nf/r/Addons4Kodi/comments/sqxj50/release_watchnixtoons2_060/
[B]1.71[/B] - Fixed lastest episode show thumbnail switch in settings
[B]1.7[/B] - Fixed thumbnail scrapes - Speed up episode list creation thanks to lpuglia
[B]1.6[/B] - Fixed premium streaming support by adding TLS 1.1 and TLS 1.2
[B]1.4[/B] - Update free domain from thewatchcartoononline.tv to wcofun.com - Fix ability to play free sources
[B]1.3[/B] - Fixed some more Python 3 related compatibility issues
[B]1.2[/B] - Fixed some Python 3 related compatibility issues
[B]1.1[/B] - Some minor peformance optimizations - Fixed episode title characters
[B]1.0[/B] - Kodi v19 support (Thanks to rekony's source for guidance on this) - Also fixed mixup between SD and HD selections
[B]0.4.9.8[/B] - Fix ability to be able to resolve premium streaming links for low quality by adding headers during link testing.
[B]0.4.9.7[/B] - Fix ability to be able to resolve premium streaming links by adding headers during link testing.
[B]0.4.9.6[/B] - Added ability to allow redirects for premium site streaming links.
[B]0.4.9.5[/B] - Fix premium site streaming that was broken from 0.4.9.4 update.
[B]0.4.9.4[/B] - Added a workaround for situations where a latest release is not available on the premium site but is on the free site. - Fixed chapter selection for episodes with multiple chapters on the premium site.
[B]0.4.9.3[/B] - Add the ability to automatically load art while searching through content.
[B]0.4.9.2[/B] - Fixed issue with getting thumbnails due to site certificate issues.
[B]0.4.9.1[/B] - Converted from pickle to cPickle for reading and writing cookie file for premium. - Streamlined the code a little and cleaned up some comments
[B]0.4.8.9[/B] - Added error handling in cases where the premium stream link gives a connection error instead of a failed response. - Added a 10 second timeout for a premiumlink response so that it doesn't sit and wait for a premiumlink in case of slow response.
[B]0.4.8.8[/B] - Added ability to automatically switch to a free stream, if available, if the premium stream is having an issue. - Disable the requirement to verify SSL connection to streams in case the located servers are having certificate issues. Should fix linux clients.
[B]0.4.8.7[/B] - Fix for favorites from Watchnixtoons when switching from premium to free user and vice versa so favorites do no have to be recreated each time.
[B]0.4.8.6[/B] - Stability enhancements to premium user streaming. Shouldn't error out as much unless the website has no playable sources.
[B]0.4.8.5[/B] - Just some documentation cleanup and optimizations
[B]0.4.8.3[/B] - Added the ability to use the addon whether a premium user or a free user.
[B]0.4.8.2[/B] - Added cookie age check and delete and recreate if over 24 hours old.
[B]0.4.8.1[/B] - Modified addon to scrape from premium site with premium account provided by user.
[B]0.4.8:[/B] - Fixed a typo in the addons.xml file (thanks @SerpentDrago!)
[B]0.4.7:[/B] - Autoplay setting reinstated. - Added an option to show letter thumbnails on the catalog sections. Only useful if you're on a custom Kodi skin. - Added a warning whenever a video is blocked from excess traffic.
[B]0.4.6:[/B] - Add-on re-enabled. Their site is back to letting free users watch videos. - To avoid overwhelming their servers on these COVID-19 quarantine times, the "autoplay highest quality" add-on setting was removed. So when you play a video, you'll always be asked what quality to use.
[B]0.4.5:[/B] - Temporary disabling of the add-on. If the source site ever comes back, we can enable it again.
[B]0.4.4:[/B] - Added an "About" button to the Trakt tab of the add-on settings, explaining how to use it.
[B]0.4.3:[/B] - Fixed the series and episode search.
